Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: Getting back to school sounds like a great goal to hang on to! It sounds like you're working hard to take positive actions and to set yourself up for a better future than maybe you can currently imagine. It's also very normal for the process of pursuing recovery to feel nonlinear and messy. (It would be so dang nice if it had the clear narrative structure of a novel...but alas. It's full of leaping forward, circling back, side quests, action rising and falling all over the place.)  But it is absolutely worth the struggle and discomfort. You deserve to have a life where you feel happily and usefully whole. Where you feel at peace in your own mind and your own skin. That life is out there, waiting for you to come home to it <3
